Menuchimzi;
User Interface
  Designer

hello,

I'm Menuchimzi. I put thought into designing the best digital experiences for users. I spend quite a lot of time working and developing my skills, particularly UI/UX, graphics & product design.

I've had the privilege of working at an advertising agency, a start-up, and a law firm. My most recent project is a mobile app that connects lovers of anime (like myself) to their favorite anime series.

In my spare time, I indulge in some hubbies such as playing video games and basketball. Did I mention that I co-host a Podcast called Your Fave Space. We talk about everything ranging from tech to anime and the daily struggles of a techie living in Nigeria >

Here is a carefully selected pick of some of my work.
